meanings: [명사] fight, contest, showdown, (informal) face-off, (대립 상황) confrontation (with), (스포츠에서의) match, [동사] fight
a confrontation between the ruling party and the opposition parties

vlive.korean: 우리 그거 대결할까? Should we do a battle? 듣기 View video (G)I-DLE : 유부초밥 🦄♥️
[응원도 질 수 없는 자존심 대결!] [The competition for cheering is unbelievable!] View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 11. “저 사람은 랩하게 생겼네;;” 한 자리에 모인 12대학 래퍼들!! 시작된 신경전!!
믿지 이제 대결하는 거 아니지? MIDZY, you aren't going to have a competition, right? 듣기 View video ITZY : ITZY in HOUSTON 💙
vlive.english: MIDZY, you aren't going to have a competition, right?

vlive.korean: [절대 질 수 없는 회기동 자존심 대결!] [They can't lose in the war between Hoegi clans!] View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 15. 겉바속촉 회기파전 아님! 경희대vs한국외대의 회기파戰에 낀 성균관! 그 결과는?
vlive.english: [They can't lose in the war between Hoegi clans!]

vlive.korean: [Q. 경희대 국제캠과의 대결 자신 있었나?] 자신 있었나? 아니면 걱정이었나? [Q. Are you confident to compete with Rap-in?] Were you confident or worried? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 20. 경희대 래빈VS 서울대 츄플 리매치!? 과연 살아남을 학교는 어디?
vlive.english: [Q. Are you confident to compete with Rap-in?] Were you confident or worried?
